@roblox/global/World.drawLine.documentation: Draws a line in space, color values are from 0-1, lifetime of 0 means it will not be cleared

@roblox/global/World.drawPoint.documentation: Draws a point in space, color values are from 0-1, lifetime of 0 means it will not be cleared

@roblox/global/World.clear.documentation: Clears all existing lines and points
